revised_title: Analyzing and Comparing Ion-Channel Gating Models
tldr: The article discusses the problem of distinguishing between different Markov models of ion-channel kinetics based on steady-state kinetic data alone. It introduces the concept of aggregated Markov models and shows that certain similarity transformations can generate a class of equivalent models with the same observable statistics. The author applies this method to various simple channel models and discusses its applications and implications.
